name: Star Slider
description:
Welcome to the world of Star Slider - an arcade space arena collect'em-up.

Pilot your Star Slider spacecraft through 70 ever challenging arenas using smooth slide control. Hold centre to thrust, slide left & right for accurate turning.

Collect the scattered Warp Stars to power your warp drive to the next arena. Escape the attacking enemy Slider Hunters with a quick tap on your ship activating a mini warp.

Expert Slider pilots may also attempt to lure enemy Hunters into a Warp Star causing them to self warp!

FEATURES:
• Smooth accurate slide controls
• Authentic arcade challenging gameplay
• Supports normal and wide displays
• Universal iPad/iPhone/iPodTouch
• Game Center leader board
